nodes.text: The bedroom of Dooku, Count of Serenno, was located in the main tower of his castle on the planet Serenno. It was very similar to the throne room, to which it was connected by a gangway. During the Clone Wars, Dooku was caught asleep in his bedroom when a group of Nightsisters led by his former acolyte Asajj Ventress infiltrated the castle to assassinate him.
